cloudpolling

Class DropBoxConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • cloudpolling.CloudConnector
      • cloudpolling.DropBoxConnector

  • public class DropBoxConnector
extends CloudConnector
    Represents a connection between a DropBox account and a camel context.
    Author:
    tlarrue

    • Constructor Detail

      • DropBoxConnector

        public DropBoxConnector(CloudAccount account,
                        org.apache.camel.ProducerTemplate producer)
        Constructs a DropBoxConnector from a cloud account and producer template. This constructor also provides instructions to authorize application to folder if there is no access token in the account's configuration file.
        Parameters:
        account -
        producer -

    • Method Detail

      • poll

        public void poll()
          throws java.io.IOException
        Connects to DropBox and starts long polling Box events. On an event, sends exchange to ActionListener and update's account's poll token.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
